seoDescription: A detailed list of the products we offer and specific information about each product.
title: Our Products
heading: We carry many categories of products:

items.title:
Lennox EL296V
HIGH-EFFICIENCY TWO-STAGE GAS FURNACE​
items.description:
The EL296V uses a variable speed motor that reduces electrical use by two-thirds, compared to a standard motor.
- Efficiency rating of 96% AFUE—can save your customers hundreds of dollars each year*, compared to standard furnaces
- SilentComfort™ Technology—delivers the ultimate in quiet, consistent heating

items.title:
Lennox ML296V
HIGH-EFFICIENCY TWO-STAGE GAS FURNACE​
items.description: The Merit ML296V Variable speed fan and two stages of gas is designed to provide a higher level of comfort. With two-stage gas valve and 96 AFUE, homeowners will see long-term cost savings. Thoroughly tested to be reliable and durable, this Merit series product delivers long-lasting comfort.

Price Guide: $$

items.title:
Lennox ML196E 
HIGH-EFFICIENCY SINGLE STAGE GAS FURNACE
items.description:
Single-stage Gas Furnace with Power Saver™ Technology

The Power Saver™ constant torque motor design uses less energy in both heating and cooling modes, helping homeowners save on utility bills. Flexible airflow based on a home's ductwork makes the ML196E 33% more efficient than older PSC motors, while also delivering high gas efficiency with the 96% AFUE.
